name: title
description: Title of the review

name: text
description: Text content of the review

name: date_stayed
description: Date when the author stayed at the hotel

name: offering_id
description: ID of the hotel

name: num_helpful_votes
description: Number of helpful votes this review received

name: date
description: Original review date string from the source data

name: id
description: Unique identifier of the review

name: via_mobile
description: Whether the review was posted via a mobile device

name: review_date
description: Date when the author posted the review (datetime)

name: author_id
description: Unique identifier of the author

name: author_name
description: Username of the author

name: author_location
description: Self-reported location of the author

name: author_num_reviews
description: Total number of reviews written by the author

name: author_num_cities
description: Number of different cities the author has reviewed

name: author_num_helpful_votes
description: Total helpful votes received by the author

name: author_num_type_reviews
description: Number of reviews of this property type by the author

name: overall
description: Overall rating given in the review

name: service
description: Service rating given in the review

name: cleanliness
description: Cleanliness rating given in the review

name: value
description: Value rating given in the review

name: location_rating
description: Location rating given in the review

name: sleep_quality
description: Sleep quality rating given in the review

name: rooms
description: Rooms rating given in the review
